title: Huawei Watch_Can I use the watch when it is not paired with my phone over Bluetooth?
answer: After your watch disconnects from your phone, you can still use the watch's alarm, timer, and stopwatch and use it to record exercise data. If you connect your watch to a Wi-Fi network, you will be able to use the features that require interaction with your phone, for example, receive notifications and incoming calls and use the voice interaction feature.
